DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effectiveness BI 1026706 powder reconstitution oral solution compare placebo relative effectiveness compare Celecoxib .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Safety Different Doses BI 1026706 Patients With Postoperative Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male accord investigator 's assessment , base follow criterion : complete medical history include physical examination , vital sign ( Blood Pressure , Pulse Rate ) , 12lead electrocardiogram , clinical laboratory test 2 . Age 18 55 year ( incl . ) 3 . Body Mass Index 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 ( incl . ) 4 . Patients schedule removal one mandibular third molar partial complete bony impaction . If medically indicate , ipsilateral third molar upper jaw could also remove ; 5 . Surgery conduct local anaesthesia use 12 % lidocaine ( epinephrine ) . Intravenous sedation general anaesthetic permit . 6 . Reliable , cooperative , adequate intelligence record request information analgesic questionnaire form 7 . Examined attend oral surgeon physician medically clear participate study 8 . Scheduled undergo qualify surgical procedure 9 . Signed date write informed consent prior admission study accordance GCP local legislation Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include Blod Pressure , Pulse Rate electrocardiogram ) deviate normal judge clinically relevant investigator 2 . Repeated measurement systolic blood pressure great 140 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure great 90 mm Hg 3 . Any laboratory value outside reference range investigator considers clinical relevance 4 . Any evidence concomitant disease judge clinically relevant investigator 5 . Acute local infection time surgery could confound postsurgical evaluation 6 . Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder 7 . Surgery gastrointestinal tract could interfere kinetics study drug ( )
